directions: In a large pitcher, combine the ingredients. Stir and let sit for at least 2 hours, refrigerated. Serve plain, over ice, or with soda water.
ingredients: 1 (750 ml) white wine (a Spanish white, made from grape varietals like Albarino, Sauvignon Blanc, Verdejo, Viura, Torrontes, or Godello)
title: White Sangria
